Paragraph: Yan and co-workers employed the branched alkyl chains attached on the backbone of the difluorobenzothiadiazole-quaterthiophene ( PffBT4T ) copolymer to acquire desirable temperature - dependent aggregation behavior.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |

| branched alkyl chains |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| difluorobenzothiadiazole-quaterthiophene (PffBT4T) copolymer |

Explanation: The only clear material name in the paragraph is "difluorobenzothiadiazole-quaterthiophene (PffBT4T) copolymer". The "branched alkyl chains" are not a specific material but rather a type of chemical structure that can be part of various materials.
